originalText.text: We have been working with Total Home on projects since we moved into our apartment in 2011.  They are very professional and we have been pleased with ALL of their services from painting, wallpaper, glass shower doors, closets, electric and more.  They make it really easy, are very knowledgable and are reliable.  They are respectful your home which is important to me b/c I have two young children.  I highly recommend them and will continue using T.H.I.S. for all of my home improvement projects.

originalText.text: We used THIS for a number of projects in our apartment - installing sofets and motorized window shades, removal of a kitchen door/re-shaping of the entry-way and painting.  One hears so many horror stories about building contractors/renovators that it was such an incredible relief to know have to worry about such things with THIS.  They are all incredibly easy to work with, flexible, responsive and the quality of the work they do is excellent.  In addition, they have worked in many buildings across the city and therefore know all the ins and outs of dealing with permits, etc so I never had to worry or even deal with it myself.

originalText.text:
We used TOTAL HOME for motorized Shades, electrical and custom closets.
I loved that they have their own electricians and that the shade package included all electrical work. I also thought it was a nice touch that their electrical work includes the full patch and paint. Other electricians I have used leave me with a bunch of holes and tell me I have to get someone else to close.
I was very pleased with their service all around and would definitely use them again.

originalText.text:
I am an interior designer and was working with T.H.I.S. for my client at the Aldyn, 60 Riverside Blvd.   My contact was Tom Quinn and he was reachable 24/7......  almost!!!

Their work are fast and workmanship are high quality!!  Cost are fair and on budget without hidden surprise.  They even provide help to install some out of scope items, such as special cove light and mirror TV in master bathroom.

They are totally recommended!!
